function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited research on the relationship between green housing and COVID-19","Impact":"Lack of understanding of how green housing affects the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Conduct extensive research to fill the knowledge gap, invest in research funding for green housing and COVID-19 studies","Technologies":"Data analysis, epidemiological studies, environmental monitoring technology","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Interactions between COVID-19, housing policies, and resident behaviors influence green housing requirements","Impact":"Potential for ineffective or inappropriate green housing policies and designs that do not consider disease spread","Mitigation":"Integrate public health experts into green housing policy development, conduct public health impact assessments for housing projects","Technologies":"Public health modeling, disease transmission analysis, community health assessments","People":"Policy makers, urban planners, public health experts","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited evidence on the impact of green housing in the context of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Inability to make informed decisions about the value and effectiveness of green housing during pandemics","Mitigation":"Collect and analyze data on green housing and COVID-19 outcomes, conduct longitudinal studies to assess the long-term impact","Technologies":"Data analytics, longitudinal research studies, environmental monitoring technology","People":"Green housing developers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
